document.title: Pellete de liens du 27-10-2005
document.author: NiKo
document.text:
Template Engines ( via ) In short, the point of template engines should be to separate your business logic from your presentation logic, not separate your PHP code from your HTML code. (Tags: php html presentation templates engine )
Take Command with AJAX [JavaScript DHTML Tutorials] Rationnaliser l'utilisation d'AJAX dans ce tutoriel de creation d'un frontend de shell en ligne. (Tags: tutorial ajax methodologie )
Bombay TV ::: Sous-titrez votre film ! Sous-titrez votre propre film indien. Trop drole. (Tags: flash tv fun haha ecards )
YouTube - Broadcast Yourself. Upload, tag and share your videos worldwide! (Tags: community video sharing )
FileZilla Develoment Server ( via ) Filezilla sous linux ! (Tags: linux ftp softs )
PHP: ignore_user_abort - Manual ( via ) This function sets whether a client disconnect should cause a script to be aborted. (Tags: php script client tips abort execution )
RSScache.com ( via ) Its the solution to all your RSS bandwidth over usage. In 10 seconds, start saving your bandwidth! (Tags: rss atom cache feeds )
MySQL AB :: MySQL 5.0 Downloads ( via ) MySQL 5 stable est sortie ! (Tags: mysql sql )
tbsOOo : TinyButStrong OOo La classe tbsOOo permet de generer dynamiquement des documents OpenOffice en separant presentation et donnees. (Tags: php ooo templates engine classe )
